City Services

City Utilities

For information about City Services and Utilities:

Contact Iris Walker at
[(979) 793-4253](tel:979-793-4253)
or by email at
[iriswalker@cityofneedville.com](mailto:iriswalker@cityofneedville.com)
Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

* Utility bills are due on the
  **10th of each month.**

  There is a 10% late fee after the 10th. Even if the 10th is a weekend, the water bills are still due and must be in the office
  on the next Business day.
* The utility bill cutoff date is the
  **20th of each month.**

  Payments after the 20th can be paid at city hall or online.
